properties.areaDesc: S of Oregon Inlet NC to Cape Hatteras NC out to 20 nm; S of Cape Hatteras NC to Ocracoke Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 30 at 3:39AM EST until January 30 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
4 to 6 ft expected.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Oregon Inlet to Ocracoke Inlet.

* WHEN...From noon today to 11 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 11 PM EST THIS EVENING
